name: BlockWorld War Racer | Aircraft Battle Game
name_original: BlockWorld War Racer | Aircraft Battle Game
description:
It is time for an exciting race with other war cube pilots!

In this game you have 4 different kind of war planes to fly with!

You can pilot them by tilting the device.

If you tap anywhere on the screen the plane will fly much faster!

This game is perfect for kids to have fun with airplanes.

This game is also the only block or cube war airplane game available on smartphone!

Take a seat and put on your pilot helmet! The race is going to be intense!!

* Fast speed!
* Beautiful cubic art!
* Fun music!
* Easy controls!
* Lots of fun!

The tournament is starting!!

Will you be fast enough to win the race?!!

Twitter: @Oscarminigames
Facebook: www.facebook.com/OscarMiniGames
